articles.description: NHTSA claims strict standards for new U.S. cars will save Americans money and reduce emissions
articles.content: Carmakers have four years to raise the fuel efficiency of new cars sold in the U.S., now that the Biden Administration and NHTSA announced stricter fuel economy standards. The rules apply to cars of … [+2671 chars]
